subject: RE: [junit] Catching RuntimeExceptions
msgSnippet: ... It seems that I can t resist this particular conversation, no matter how much I try. J. B. Rainsberger, President, Diaspar Software Services Let s write
messageBody:

>J.B., I was wondering when you were going to jump in to this thread!
:-)

It seems that I can't resist this particular conversation, no matter
how much I try.
